Original title: Another Earth
Year: 2011
Duration: 92 min.
Country: United States
Director: Mike Cahill
Screenplay: Mike Cahill, Brit Marling
Music: Fall On Your Sword
Photo: Mike Cahill
Cast: Brit Marling, William Mapother, Jordan Baker, Flint Beverage, Robin Taylor, Kumar Pallana
Studio: Fox Searchlight Pictures / Artists Public Domain
Genre: Science Fiction. Drama. Romance | Indie USA
Website: http://www.anotherearth.com/

Synopsis
Rhoda Williams, a bright young man who has just been accepted into a program of astrophysics at MIT, wants to explore the universe. John Burroughs, a composer who has just reached the peak of his career, is about to become a father for the second time. Rhoda and John are not known, but the eve of the discovery of an Earth a horrible tragedy that weaves and irreversibly alters their lives duplicate occurs.

Awards
2011: Sundance Film Festival: Special Jury Award - Drama
2011: Festival of Locarno: Section Officer feature films in competition
2011: Sitges Film Festival: Best Actress (Brit Marling)
2011: Gotham Awards: Nominated for Best Director
2011: Independent Spirit Awards: Nominated for Best First Screenplay and Best First
